pages.title: Summoning Scroll
pages.text: With this scroll you can summon a Shroomling. The Shroomling has some allergies for spores and will sneeze at random times.

pages.title: Fey Mushroom
pages.text: If the area the shroomling is in, is not well lit up, it will spawn a fey mushroom to light up the area.$(br)You can easily harvest the fey mushroom and replace it.

pages.title: Fey Mushroom
pages.text: RIGHT clicking with fey dust or bonemeal will light up the mushroom. Don't use to much or it will loose it magic.

pages.title: Mooshroom Cow
pages.text: If the Shroomling sneezes near a cow it might infect it with the 'shrooms', turning the cow into a Mooshroom Cow

pages.title: MooShroom Cow
pages.text: Did you know you can shear a Mooshroom cow, it will remove it's mushrooms and turn it into a normal cow again.

pages.title: MooShroom Cow
pages.text: You can hold a bowl near a Mushroom Cow and milk it for some fresh Mushroom Stew.
